text: @realDonaldTrump I'm so thankful my folks see thru you now. COVID-19 made them shake their heads at you for the first time and now, after seeing how you respond to the Floyd murder, lack of care other than for yourself, they're voting Biden in November. They didn't turn blue, just no more of you
